page.title: 16GOODWOOD HOUSE STABLES
page.content:
Goodwood House has stables next to the house.They are private stables where Lady March keeps her horses and other stables where the racehorses are kept when there is racing at Goodwood. There are 3 dressage arenas, a main one, and two practise ones. There are two stands and five boxes for the judges. There is a large building like a barn that is used as an indoor riding school. Near the golf club are the paddocks which is a large fenced field. There is a cross country course running from the golf course to Goodwood House and there is a hill which is used for the gallops.
By Lorna Hooper
